name: Commander
description: This pokemon makes the inside of an ally Dondozo's mouth it's base of operations and takes charge from there. Using it's cunning strategies to barrel through a fight!
effect: When entering a battle with an ally Dondozo, this mon grants them increases in Strength, Special, Defense, Special Defense and Dexterity all by 2. All attack's targeting this pokemon automatically miss as long as the ally Dondozo is active. This ability can only activate between one pair of Tatsugiri and Dondozo per battle. This Ability cannot be swapped, copied, or replaced (ignoring the effects of Skill Swap, Worry Seed, Trace etc.)
